hero_description1: Discover our range of Spiral Mixers and Beater Mixers!
hero_description2: Performance and reliability to enhance your culinary creations.
about_description: We are committed to collaborating with you to understand your goals and create a strategy that will achieve them.
versatility_description: Durand offers a wide range of products to meet the needs of every client.
innovation_description: Durand's technical team focuses on regular updates to meet client needs.
technical_assistance_description: Durand's global network provides comprehensive commercial support, both before and after sales.
world_class_manufacturing_description1: Ready to transform your digital presence?
world_class_manufacturing_description2: Let's create magic together! Book our services now!
about_us_description: Welcome to our world. We are here for you, ready to respond quickly.
durant_french1: is a French company that designs and manufactures spiral mixers and mixer beaters for artisanal and industrial bakery and pastry.
durant_french3: Our brand Durand French Mix was born.
durant_french4: It is a subsidiary of the HBY Holding group, which now has over fifteen years of experience in the bakery and pastry industry. The main objectives of our brand are to create and design innovative and high-performance kneaders and mixers.
